snippet: William Bryan Jennings, 47, was charged with second-degree assault, theft of services and intimidation by bias or bigotry for allegedly stabbing a Middle Eastern cab driver in December and making racially charged statements.
abstract: William Bryan Jennings, 47, was charged with second-degree assault, theft of services and intimidation by bias or bigotry for allegedly stabbing a Middle Eastern cab driver in December and making racially charged statements.

headline.main: Morgan Stanley Banker Charged With Assault
